title: Start
body:
<<faceUp Renata>>
<<faceDown Mia>>
<<detachFrom Renata Mia>>
<<pauseFor Renata 1.0>>
<<moveDown Mia 3 10>>
<<moveUp Renata 2 10>>
<<pauseFor Renata 1.0>>
<<faceRight Renata>>
<<pauseFor Renata 0.5>>
Renata: I see Haia's trail again!
<<moveRight Mia 4 60>>
<<moveUp Mia 5 60>>
<<pauseFor Mia 1.0>>
<<faceRight Mia>>
Mia: And over there.<<attachTo Renata Mia>>
